title: Is it possible for someone to Zhonya's Hourglass twice in 48 seconds?
body: just played a ranked game and their syndra did it. How I noticed was we both zhonya at the same time at the final fight then before I even respawned she did it again right at the end of the game which was 48 seconds later after reviewing the reply. I thought cdr doesn't effect active abilities on items but was this changed or how is this possible?
